div.div:
V
- Login pages
- Home pages
- Table page

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 133px; height: 1px; padding-top: 423px; margin-left: 264px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 158px; height: 1px; padding-top: 268px; margin-left: 611px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
div.font:
Reading/writing delegated to the Service Layer:
- all User related: FB
- online games: FB
- bot games: local

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 238px; height: 1px; padding-top: 375px; margin-left: 1px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
div.font:
MVVM / layered architecture
Boxes: classes
Blobs: hooks/other components
Red arrows: only User functionality
-s: singleton
Stack:
MUI, styled-components, jquery
React
Firebase (RTDB, Firestore)
Ionic capacitor

div.div:
App context
- session management
- theming
- hoisting state

- useControls
- useBot
- useHands
...
* user interaction w games managed here

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 158px; height: 1px; padding-top: 156px; margin-left: 611px;

div.font:
All game flow managed by Game
(User methods mostly through Game, sometimes by components too but usually via callbacks)
